area: An old building that seems to be falling apart, it used to be for watching movies.

room: A pretty dark room with the faint glow of sunshine flowing in. The place looks like it's been abandoned for years, you can see dust floating everywhere you go.
items: Someone must have left this in the lobby right before the place shut down, it's pretty stale.
structures: This looks like where people would get their tickets and purchase refreshments.

room: It seems to go pretty far in all directions, you can see posters on the walls of the last films that were showed here.
items: Someone must have left this in the lobby right before the place shut down, it's pretty stale.
structures: Looks like one of those family friendly live action movies, there doesn't look like there's much substance to it. You can start to see why this place got shut down.
It's hard to make out what this poster says, it looks like it has been torn off. All that's really left is a large eyeball staring directly at you.
Now this is some cool stuff! There's 30 guys fighting in a battle royal to the death! Wouldn't it have been cool to have seen this one?
A guy, and a girl, alone in paris? Quite a unique set of circumstances wouldn't you say? There's usually more than two people in a big city.
Looks like something about a guy making pizza. It seems to take place in midieval times, maybe it's about how they used to make pizza in the olden days?
